Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.service.invoker.HttpServiceArgumentResolver

Packages that use HttpServiceArgumentResolver
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.service.invoker
Support for creating a client proxy for an HTTP service annotated with HttpExchange methods.

  • Uses of HttpServiceArgumentResolver in org.springframework.web.service.invoker

    Classes in org.springframework.web.service.invoker that implement HttpServiceArgumentResolver
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractNamedValueArgumentResolver
    Base class for arguments that resolve to a named request value such as a request header, path variable, cookie, and others.
    class 
    CookieValueArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @CookieValue annotated arguments.
    class 
    HttpMethodArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver that resolves the target request's HTTP method from an HttpMethod argument.
    class 
    PathVariableArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @PathVariable annotated arguments.
    class 
    RequestAttributeArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @RequestAttribute annotated arguments.
    class 
    RequestBodyArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @RequestBody annotated arguments.
    class 
    RequestHeaderArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @RequestHeader annotated arguments.
    class 
    RequestParamArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver for @RequestParam annotated arguments.
    class 
    UrlArgumentResolver
    HttpServiceArgumentResolver that resolves the URL for the request from a URI argument.
    Methods in org.springframework.web.service.invoker with parameters of type HttpServiceArgumentResolver
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    HttpServiceProxyFactory.addCustomArgumentResolver(HttpServiceArgumentResolver resolver)
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    in favor of using the Builder to initialize the HttpServiceProxyFactory instance.
    HttpServiceProxyFactory.Builder
    HttpServiceProxyFactory.Builder.customArgumentResolver(HttpServiceArgumentResolver resolver)
    Register a custom argument resolver, invoked ahead of default resolvers.
